definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
saliva/sweat/a ferry crossing/a ford (river crossing)/abbr. for Tianjin 天津
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Cathy YE Tissue Engineering and Bioprocessing, Oxford, lecturer.
sentences.chinese: 牛津大學，組織工程與生物加工中心，講師。

sentences.english: 1214 - University of Oxford receives its charter.
sentences.chinese: 1214年的今天，牛津大學獲得特許執照。

sentences.english: I played on the Oxford University varsity basketball team.
sentences.chinese: 我當時是牛津大學籃球隊的成員。

sentences.english: The Cambridge University rows against Oxford every year.
sentences.chinese: 劍橋大學每年與牛津大學進行划船比賽。

sentences.english: Len Seymour Clinical Pharmacology, Oxford, Professor.
sentences.chinese: 牛津大學，臨牀藥學系，教授。

sentences.english: C. The Chinese Students at Oxford D. The University of Oxford
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了牛津大學的歷史，現狀和大學生活。

sentences.english: Tom Tower is a bell tower in Christ Church College, the University of Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆塔是牛津大學基督教堂學院的一座鐘塔。

sentences.english: Dr Francesca Crowe, of Oxford University, is working on the project。
sentences.chinese: 來自牛津大學的克洛維博士參與了這項調查研究。

sentences.english: Saks obtained a master's degree in letters from Oxford.
sentences.chinese: Saks在牛津大學獲得了文科碩士學位。

sentences.english: She was reading for a degree of classical literature in Oxford when the war broke out.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭爆發時她正在牛津大學攻讀古典文學學位。

sentences.english: I thought that some future Layard might exhume the cornices of the Oxford temples.
sentences.chinese: 我想未來的萊亞德或許會發掘出牛津大學殿堂的飛檐。

sentences.english: Beral is director of the cancer epidemiology unit of Oxford University.
sentences.chinese: 蓓拉爾是牛津大學癌症流行病學小組的主任。
他擔任牛津大學賽船的掌舵人。

sentences.english: At present he has become a Professor of Chemistry at Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 他現在已是牛津大學的化學教授了。

sentences.english: And also has completed the Strategic Leadership Program of University of Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 最近莫志明先生完成了牛津大學的領導策略課程。

sentences.english: A proctor's assistant at Oxford University or Cambridge University.
sentences.chinese: 牛津大學或劍橋大學裏學監的助手。

pinyin: Pu3 lin2 si1 dun4 Da4 xue2
Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2

definition: doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位

pinyin: Xin1 jia1 po1 Guo2 li4 Da4 xue2
